title: Quiet Day Though Russell 2000 Returns To Key Consolidation Support
text:
There wasn't a whole lot to say for Tuesday's market activity; indices were down, but there was little to add aside from the returning to key consolidation support. The 'bear trap' will likely be coming under pressure later in the week.

RUT Daily Chart

But there was little from other indices to suggest potential trouble. The is at the upper threshold of its former pennant range, but stuck in the middle of its larger consolidation.

SPX Daily Chart

COMPQ Daily Chart

The is another index in the middle of a smaller consolidation, which itself is in the middle of larger consolidation.

There isn't too much to day say about yesterday, although the is feeling the pressure. Keep a watchful eye on what it does, as its action will likely determine what will go for the NASDAQ and S&P.
description: Stocks Analysis by Declan Fallon covering: S&P 500, US SmallCap 2000, NASDAQ Composite. Read Declan Fallon's latest article on Investing.com
